metadata.title: CVE-2022-48671 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: cgroup:Add missing cpus_read_lock() to cgroup_attach_task_all() syzbot is hittingpercpu_rwsem_assert_held(&cpu_hotplug_lock) warning at cpuset_attach() [1],for commit 4f7e7236435ca0ab ("cgroup: Fix threadgroup_rwsem <->cpus_read_lock() deadlock") missed that cpuset_attach() is also called fromcgroup_attach_task_all(). Add cpus_read_lock() like whatcgroup_procs_write_start() does.
